pkgmetadata.longdescription: DynamoDB adopter for casbinInstallation------------Run `pip install python-dycasbin`Usage-----```pythonimport casbinfrom python_dycasbin import adapteradapter = adapter.Adapter(table_name='casbin_rule', endpoint_url='http://localhost:8000')e = casbin.Enforcer("model.conf", adapter, True)sub = "eve4" # the user that wants to access a resource.obj = "data3" # the resource that is going to be accessed.act = "read" # the operation that the user performs on the resource.if e.enforce(sub, obj, act): print("Allow")else: print("Deny")```Running tests---------------* Install [pytest](https://pypi.org/project/pytest/) and [pytest-mock](https://pypi.org/project/pytest-mock/)* Run `pytest` from project root
